    • Method Detail

      • getProcessIdentifier

        public static final int getProcessIdentifier()
        Returns the current JVM process identifier.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if accessing the process identifier fails.

      • getVariable

        public static final java.lang.String getVariable(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the value of the specified environment variable. An environment variable is a system-dependent external named value.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the environment variable, not null
        Returns:
        the string value of the variable or null if the variables is not defined in the system environment or if SecurityException is thrown

      • getVariableAsBoolean

        public static final boolean getVariableAsBoolean(java.lang.String name)
